content: चेष्ट् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (चेष्टते, चेष्टित) {@--1@} To move about, stir, be active, show signs of life; यदा स देवो जागर्ति तदेदं चेष्टते जगत् <ls>Ms. 1. 52</ls>; <ls>Māl. 8. 8</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 27.</ls> {@--2@} To make effort, endeavour, exert oneself, struggle. {@--3@} To perform, do (anything). {@--4@} To frequent. {@--5@} To behave, act. --WITH वि {1} to stir, move, be in motion, move about. {2} to act, behave.
